Package splEvolutionCore

Interface CanvasBasedApplicationConfiguration

public interface CanvasBasedApplicationConfiguration
Integration of functionality that is responsible to extend the Canvas
Author:
Jakub Perdek

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    CANTO_SCRIPT_RESOURCE_LOCATION
    The location of CantoJS script (perceived as resource or one of SPL assets)
    static final String
    CANTO_TARGET_LOCATION
    The relative location of CantoJS script in project/SPL directory as one of its assets
    static final boolean
    WRAP_WITH_CANTO_JS
    Allows to use canvas CantoJS wrapper along with evolved (fractal-based) content if true then CantoJS is used to wrap canvas otherwise false

  • Method Summary

    Static Methods
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    insertAndCopyCantoImport(List<Resource> importResources, String targetPath)
    Inserts the CantoJS import to the beginning of the HTML template for testing purposes and copies the CantoJS scripts -copies CantoJS from CanvasBasedApplicationConfiguration.CANTO_SCRIPT_RESOURCE_LOCATION to CanvasBasedApplicationConfiguration.CANTO_TARGET_LOCATION
    static String
    wrapWithCantoJS(String scriptString)
    Wraps each call to get context into new CantoJS instance -the wrapper is providing the same functionality + its extensions like chaining or allows to get previously used position -different CantoJS objects are independent of each other!!!

  • Field Details

    • WRAP_WITH_CANTO_JS

      static final boolean WRAP_WITH_CANTO_JS
      Allows to use canvas CantoJS wrapper along with evolved (fractal-based) content if true then CantoJS is used to wrap canvas otherwise false
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • CANTO_SCRIPT_RESOURCE_LOCATION

      static final String CANTO_SCRIPT_RESOURCE_LOCATION
      The location of CantoJS script (perceived as resource or one of SPL assets)
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • CANTO_TARGET_LOCATION

      static final String CANTO_TARGET_LOCATION
      The relative location of CantoJS script in project/SPL directory as one of its assets
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • wrapWithCantoJS

      static String wrapWithCantoJS(String scriptString)
      Wraps each call to get context into new CantoJS instance -the wrapper is providing the same functionality + its extensions like chaining or allows to get previously used position -different CantoJS objects are independent of each other!!! - do not share resource even if are based on the same context!!!
      Parameters:
      scriptString - - the script content or code written in JavaScript or TypeScript
      Returns:
      the script content provided in function parameter updated on places to adapt/incorporate CantoJS as HTML canvas wrapper

    • insertAndCopyCantoImport

      static void insertAndCopyCantoImport(List<Resource> importResources, String targetPath) throws IOException
      Inserts the CantoJS import to the beginning of the HTML template for testing purposes and copies the CantoJS scripts -copies CantoJS from CanvasBasedApplicationConfiguration.CANTO_SCRIPT_RESOURCE_LOCATION to CanvasBasedApplicationConfiguration.CANTO_TARGET_LOCATION
      Parameters:
      importResources - - the list of resources such as imports, template assets
      targetPath - - the root from destination location of the project/SPL
      Throws:
      IOException
